channel.title: Help to put server online
channel.description:
Can someone help me to put this server online: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,378544.0.html
I downloaded client and source,
If u would be so sweet and help me, add msn: emil_stahre15@hotmail.com, and skype: emils1337
Or If u know a better source and client , plz tell me
Thx :)

item.title: Help to put server online
item.dc:creator: @oceano1 oceano1
item.description:
@oceano1 wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Follow that guide. Also may I ask why you are putting that server online? Do you plan on editing this server or do you plan on hosting it?

Read full topic

item.title: Help to put server online
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“samoankilla, post:2, topic:402603”]Its real easy.

  1. PORTFORWARD
  2. SET JAVA PATHS
  3. GET NO-IP
  4. RUN SERVER
    WALA Server Online! xDD[/quote]

Not really explained if he doesn’t know the websites…

Go to port-forward.com and find your router and use the tutorial, then get no-ip from no-ip.org by making an account and setting the no-ip, then change your ip in client.java(client-sided) to 127.0.0.1 so that you could log in. After you portforward go to canyouseeme.org yo see if you portforwarded right, it would say successfully, w.e

Read full topic
